title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: During my time as a Machine Learning Engineer at ecaptureDtech, I trained computer vision models and object tracking in videos recorded in motion for deployment in production. A notable achievement was assembling and modernizing a backend without documentation or prior team knowledge, successfully migrating it to a microservices-based architecture.

title: Technical Consultant
description: My current experience as a technical consultant in R&D has strengthened my skills in documenting and communicating technological projectsâ€”key competencies in the field of Machine Learning. By drafting documentation for tax deductions, I have gained a deep understanding of innovation and development processes, as well as efficient resource management in complex projects. This experience enables me to approach problems from a comprehensive perspective, aligning Machine Learning solutions with strategic objectives and ensuring regulatory compliance, which is essential for success in production environments.
